atg.adapter.secure
Class GenericSecuredMutableContentRepository

java.lang.Object
  atg.nucleus.GenericService
      atg.adapter.secure.GenericSecuredRepository
          atg.adapter.secure.GenericSecuredMutableRepository
              atg.adapter.secure.GenericSecuredMutableContentRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminableService, ApplicationLogging, ComponentNameResolver, ContentRepository, atg.repository.DisplayableRepository, java.util.EventListener, MutableRepository, NameContextBindingListener, NameContextElement, NameResolver, Repository, RepositoryViewContainer, SecuredMutableRepository, SecuredRepository, Service, ServiceListener
public class GenericSecuredMutableContentRepository
extends GenericSecuredMutableRepository
implements ContentRepository

A subclass of GenericSecureMutableRepository which implements the ContentRepository API. This repository should be used to wrap the GSARepository because it implements both MutableRepository AND ContentRepository.
